alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 18 at 9:43PM PST until November 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. This includes Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon Roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest late tonight through late Saturday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside near large trees. If possible, remain at home during the windstorm and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Santa Monica Mountains
